title: Bronze 1 > Silver 5
body: Why in the hell are the people I'm playing with getting more stupid instead of less?

replies.body:
I was silver 3 last season and had rough placements this time.
I won 13 matches in a row, with some good carry games to get out of bronze... now it just seems everyone I play with has their brains melting on the floor in front of the toilet and they have forgotten which way round to hold their mouse after meeting Todd Carney.
A silver 5 is just a bronze 1 that managed to make it through promos. They are the same thing, just like a gold 5 is a silver 1, and a plat 5 is a gold 1.

Silver is the MMR of Unranked. So you get a lot of new accounts and less experienced.

Once you hit Silver 1 it gets a little better.

Bronze is easy, the real struggle is silver 4-2

Bronze Silver and Gold are all easy. The stuggle begins in plat 2 and extends to plat 1 and diamond 5. Most Diamonds don't care if they win because they have achieved realistically the highest rewards they can, so they will first time galio. The plats are so toxic because they have the dream that they can make it into diamond and any little mistake ends up in crucifixion. Then once you pass this hell you end up in diamond 4 where in the early hours its not uncommon for you to end up against master and challenger players in ranked as d4 is the top 1000 players on this server.

I've noticed. I'm Gold 2 now getting mostly Plat 4's and 3's in my games.

In Silver if you give up first blood, people say "gg" as a joke. In Plat they mean it LOL
Had a jungle Udyr give up first blood from getting killed at his red, so he proceeded to just troll since he said the game was over anyway.

The problem that you will find is, people that got carried through their provisionals and got placed in S5-3 find there way to S5, and don't get demoted because of the Anti-dropping mechanics of ranked.

Generally speaking a fair amount of S5 players are low bronze players that got lucky.

but b1=s5

same shit , different smell

I was in promos for Bronze 2 last season and I was being put with Bronze 5s who I shit you not HAD NOT WON A SINGLE RANKED GAME THAT SEASON. While going up against teams of Silver for some reason. You can imagine how those games went.  -_-
